alp.core
Class Port

java.lang.Object
  alp.core.Port
Direct Known Subclasses:
LargePort
public class Port
extends java.lang.Object

Specifies Input/Output parameters for Component and Signal. The default constructors creates a single bit port with STD_LOGIC type

Version:
September, 2007
Author:
Ricardo Menotti, Author Page, DC UFSCar
See Also:
Signal, Component
